Bash(timeout 30 bash -c "PYTHONPATH=core:exports python -c ""
import asyncio
from exports.influencer_scouting_agent import default_agent

async def test\(\):
    result = await default_agent.run\({
        ''brand_values'': [''sustainability''],
        ''min_engagement_rate'': 3.5,
        ''platforms'': [''instagram''],
        ''filters'': {}
    }, mock_mode=False\)
    print\(''Success:'', result.success\)
    print\(''Steps:'', result.steps_executed\)
    print\(''Output keys:'', list\(result.output.keys\(\)\) if result.output else []\)
    if result.error:
        print\(''Error:'', result.error[:200]\)

asyncio.run\(test\(\)\)
"" 2>&1")
